languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} fires its manoeuvring thrusters and slides a short distance to the side.
When strafing into an enemy ship, both ships suffer {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 90% of {g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Voidship Ram{/g} damage.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>
languages.original_text: Корабль запускает маневровые двигатели и скользит вбок на небольшое расстояние. При боковом столкновении с вражеским кораблем оба судна получают {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g}, составляющий 90% от урона Тарана кораблем. Восстановление: случайное, (от 1 до 3) раундов.

traits.locale_text: The flagship fires its manoeuvring thrusters and slides a short distance to the side. When strafing into an enemy ship, both ships suffer damage equal to 90% of the Voidship Ram damage. Cooldown: 1–3 rounds at random.

The flagship fires its manoeuvring thrusters and slides a short distance to the side. When strafing into an enemy ship, both ships suffer damage equal to 90% of Voidship Ram damage. Cooldown: 1–3 rounds at random.

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} fires its manoeuvring thrusters and slides a short distance to the side. When strafing into an enemy ship, both ships suffer {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 90% of Voidship Ram damage. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random.

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}fires{/g} its manoeuvring thrusters and slides a short distance to the side. When strafing into an enemy ship, both ships suffer {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 90% of Voidship Ram damage. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random.

languages.text: Корабль запускает маневровые двигатели и скользит вбок на небольшое расстояние. При боковом столкновении с вражеским кораблем оба судна получают {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g}, составляющий 90% от урона Тарана кораблем. Восстановление: случайное, (от 1 до 3) раундов.

When strafing into an enemy ship, both ships suffer {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 90% of Voidship Ram damage. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Корабль{/g} запускает маневровые двигатели и скользит вбок на небольшое расстояние. При боковом столкновении с вражеским кораблем оба судна получают урон, составляющий 90% от урона Тарана кораблем. {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Восстановление{/g}: случайное, 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Корабль{/g} запускает маневровые двигатели и скользит вбок на небольшое расстояние. При боковом столкновении с вражеским кораблем оба судна получают урон, составляющий 90% от урона Тарана кораблем. {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Восстановление{/g}: случайное, 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

languages.text:
Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} aktiviert seine Schubdüsen und gleitet etwas zur Seite.
Wird durch den Manöverangriff ein feindliches Schiff getroffen, erleiden beide Schiffe 90 % des {g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Raumschiff-Rammbock{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schadens{/g}.
<indent=5%>Abklingzeit: <u>(1 bis 3)</u> Runden nach dem Zufallsprinzip.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} fires its manoeuvring thrusters and slides a short distance to the side.
When strafing into an enemy ship, both ships suffer {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 90% of {g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Voidship Ram{/g} damage.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text: Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}feuert{/g} seine Schubdüsen und gleitet ein Stück zur Seite. Sollte durch den Manöverangriff dabei ein Feindschiff getroffen werden, erleiden beide Schiffe 90 % des Raumschiff-Rammbock-Schadens. {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}: zufällig 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g}.

Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} aktiviert seine Schubdüsen und gleitet etwas zur Seite. Wird durch den Manöverangriff ein feindliches Schiff getroffen, erleiden beide Schiffe 90 % des Raumschiff-Rammbock-{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schadens{/g}. Abklingzeit: (1 bis 3) Runden nach dem Zufallsprinzip.

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} active ses propulseurs de manœuvre et glisse brièvement sur le côté.
En cas de collision latérale avec un vaisseau ennemi, les deux vaisseaux subissent des {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} correspondant à 90 % des dégâts du {g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Bélier de vaisseau spatial{/g}.
<indent=5%>Temps de recharge : <u>(de 1 à 3)</u> rounds (aléatoire).</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} fires its manoeuvring thrusters and slides a short distance to the side.
When strafing into an enemy ship, both ships suffer {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 90% of {g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Voidship Ram{/g} damage.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}active{/g} ses propulseurs de manœuvre et glisse brièvement sur le côté. En cas de mitraillage d'un vaisseau ennemi, les deux vaisseaux subissent des dégâts correspondant à 90 % des dégâts du Bélier de Vaisseau Spatial. {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Délai de récupération{/g} : 1 à 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} (aléatoire).

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}启动机动推进器，侧向滑行一小段距离。
若侧向移动撞击到敌舰，则两艘舰船都会受到{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于{g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}舰船撞角{/g}伤害的90%。
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到三轮</u>。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} fires its manoeuvring thrusters and slides a short distance to the side.
When strafing into an enemy ship, both ships suffer {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 90% of {g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Voidship Ram{/g} damage.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} enciende sus impulsores de maniobra y se desliza ligeramente hacia un lado.
Al chocar contra una nave enemiga, ambas naves sufren {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} igual al 90 % del daño de {g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Ariete de nave del vacío{/g}.
<indent=5%>Tiempo de recuperación: <u>(de 1 a 3)</u> asaltos aleatoriamente.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} fires its manoeuvring thrusters and slides a short distance to the side.
When strafing into an enemy ship, both ships suffer {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 90% of {g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Voidship Ram{/g} damage.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}enciende{/g} sus impulsores de maniobra y se desliza ligeramente hacia un lado. Al chocar contra una nave enemiga, ambas naves sufren daño igual al 90 % del daño de Ariete de nave del vacío. {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Tiempo de recuperación{/g}: 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}, aleatorio.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が機動用スラスターを点火し、横に少しスライドする。 敵艦に直撃した場合、両艦ともヴォイドシップ・ラムのダメージの90%に相当する{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。 クールダウン：ランダムで（1～3）ラウンド。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} fires its manoeuvring thrusters and slides a short distance to the side. When strafing into an enemy ship, both ships suffer {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 90% of Voidship Ram damage. Cooldown: (from 1 to 3) rounds at random.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が機動用スラスターを点火し、横に少しスライドする。 敵艦に直撃した場合、両艦ともヴォイドシップ・ラムのダメージの90%に相当する{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。 クールダウン：ランダムで（1～3）ラウンド。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Sancak gemisi{/g}, manevra iticilerini ateşleyerek yan tarafa doğru kısa bir mesafe kayar.
Yanlamasına ilerlerken bir düşman gemisine çarparsa iki gemi de {g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Uçsuz Gemisi Koçbaşı Vuruşu{/g} kabiliyetinin verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasarın{/g} %90'ı kadar hasara maruz kalır.
<indent=5%>Dolum Süresi: Rastgele <u>(1 ila 3)</u> raunt.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} fires its manoeuvring thrusters and slides a short distance to the side.
When strafing into an enemy ship, both ships suffer {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 90% of {g|f:7b1ab2c9456a44febdc41b71f14d8df5}Voidship Ram{/g} damage.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Sancak gemisi{/g}, manevra iticilerini ateşleyerek yan tarafa doğru kısa bir mesafe kayar. Yanlamasına ilerlerken bir düşman gemisine çarparsa iki gemi de Uçsuz Gemisi Koçbaşı Vuruşu kabiliyetinin verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasarın{/g} %90'ı kadar hasara maruz kalır. Dolum Süresi: Rastgele (1 ila 3) raunt.
